What am I doing?

Mar 15, 2019

So here’s what’s going on…

I’m learning Jekyll. I was attempting Gatsby and ReactJS but I find javascript a tad daunting.

I’m brewing many things, such as a cream ale, a helles, and an altbier that’s ready to go on tap shortly.

I’m redesiging the WAZE homebrew club webpage to be more minimal.

We’re in the initial planning stages for another competition called the Fizzy Yellow Beer Cup that should be a lot of fun since it’s styles that aren’t too taking to judge.
